articles.description: Gautam Gambhir, who played a crucial 97-run knock final in the 2011 ODI WC final, pointed out the contributions of his teammates that didn't get noticed.
articles.content: Gautam Gambhir has again expressed his displeasure at the hero worship in Indian cricket. Gambhir, who played a vital role in Indias 2007 World Twenty20 and 2011 ODI World Cup triumphs, pointed out t… [+3231 chars]
